english.segment1: You know it´s all the same. Every single pretty word you say. The taller the talk the farther the fall. We watch you fall away. Living life in the fast lane. You´re slipping fast. Don´t lose control. Living life in the fast lane
english.segment2: Get up get up get up!. You know it´s all the same. Just walk away from everything you were
english.segment3: You´re a fake!. I can see the knots that your tongue makes. Forever missing the crucial element.
